name: Goosebumps ALPHA
description:
A fan remaster of a choose-your-own-adventure Goosebumps book. 

This project aims at digitizing physical media using Twine. 

This is also a editing, modernizing, and typing exercise. 

Twine Alpha version of Give Yourself Goosebumps - The Knight in Screaming Armor
